channel.title: Mithscape 508 source lag
channel.description:
I've gone through about 10 or so sources so far trying to find a good one, and I've come to mithscape 508. It seems good, but there is a big issue. When I walk, my character stops every 5 or so boxes. I'm not sure if it is lag or something else.
I'm hosting it on a 2gb ram vps with 500gb bandwidth. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
I changed back to hybrid pvp v3 source, which wasn't doing it before, and now it is. I've noticed server side I get multiple errors of "invalid waypoint in walking queue" and client side I get Error: T1 123,0 - 36,36

item.title: Mithscape 508 source lag
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Brutal I am Brutal
item.description:
@I_am_Brutal wrote:

Any ideas as to what specific files could be causing it?
I’m trying to get this server up to par as quickly as possible, because I’ve been searching for about two weeks, and I want this up so the vps isn’t a waste haha.

Or actually; Do you know any 317 sources that don’t suck horribly?
So by default that makes any delta source and hybrid pvp a no.

Read full topic

item.title: Mithscape 508 source lag
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

I downloaded mithscape awhile back to experiment. Truth is, theres alot of dead code in mithscape. Try to clean some of it up.

Read full topic
